transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir, Minakshi bol rahi hun.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Subah, haan subah aapse baat nahi ho rahi thi aapka aapne call rakh diya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, main ye keh rahi thi aapko
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: ki aapka jo profile hai na IndiaMART pe
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: blue certificate ka tha wo maine TrustSeal team ko update kar ke de denge. Aapka open ho jayega, theek hai?
Customer: Kya ho gaya tha?
Executive: Dusra certificate bhi na wo aapko dispatch ho jayega aapke address pe. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur dusra jo account manager tha wo maine aapka change kara diya hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Account manager jo tha aapka pehle Vivek Arya the ab maine Mohammad Shahnawaz kar diya. Wo bhi Patna Bihar se hi belong karte hain. To maine aapki jo aur yahan head office mein kaam karte hain. To ek aapko personal connect sa feel hoga unse baat kar ke isliye maine aapka account manager unko assign kar diya.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai sir na? Koi issue to nahi hai ab aapko?
Customer: Theek hai, koi issue nahi.
Executive: Haan, to sir aapko agar aapko koi dikkat ho to aap mujhe bhi call kar sakte ho. Theek hai? Ya aap usko bhi call kar sakte ho Shahnawaz ko bhi. Shahnawaz ka account detail mein na number dikhta hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap aapka jo bhi account manager hoga na uska detail wahan pe dikhega. To aapko call kar lenge aur sir whatsapp message wagera pe bhi aapko connect kar lenge. Jisse comfortable ho aap unse connect kar lijiyega. Aur maine team ko update kar diya hai rest Shahnawaz follow kar ke aapka dispatch karwa denge. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Yahi do doubt the na sir aapko?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapka ye wala request close kar rahi hun. Bataiye ye tha ki mere ko TrustSeal certificate lete samay bataya gaya tha ki social media integration milega, theek hai na?
Executive: To social media integration ka jo jaise aapka koi YouTube channel bana hua hai, LinkedIn ka ya Instagram ka aapki profile business profile bani hui hai na uska link aap de dijiye. Hum aapke IndiaMART ko promote kar denge. Aap link denge na to hum aapko update kar denge ya hum aapko khud bhi bata denge jo control panel humne aapko diya hai na wahan pe bhi aap us link wahan par ja ke aap apne aap se bhi link dal sakte hain.
Customer: Hmm, theek hai.
Executive: Ji, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Clear hai na sir? Theek hai sir. To main ise close kar rahi hun sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile was not opening on IndiaMART.

- Customer had doubts regarding TrustSeal certificate.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the TrustSeal team.

- Executive changed the account manager.

- Executive explained social media integration process.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, trustseal, account manager, social media
